name: Microwave Samsung (GE88SUG/BW)
origAbout: Samsung triple distribution system ensures that everything from pizza to warm milk turns out to be perfectly prepared and tasty thanks to three microwave distribution points. Thanks to Samsung microwaves, you will enjoy uniform, careful cooking. No time to turn over a cookbook? Can't find a udent recipe? Then let Samsung oven auto menu cook something delicious for you. Instead of recalling cooking time and temperature, simply select an item from the menu and press the button to get the dish. Samsung's rapid defrosting feature allows you to quickly and evenly defrost frozen foods, returning products to their fresh, pre-frozen state and reducing time to a tasty dinner.
